project_plan.name: Temperature Conversion Command-Line Tool in Python
project_plan.description: Create a command-line tool that allows users to convert temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin.

task.name: Implement temperature conversion from Celsius to Fahrenheit
Implement temperature conversion from Celsius to Kelvin
Implement temperature conversion from Fahrenheit to Celsius
Implement temperature conversion from Fahrenheit to Kelvin
Implement temperature conversion from Kelvin to Celsius
Implement temperature conversion from Kelvin to Fahrenheit
Implement user input handling to specify the input temperature and output unit
Write tests for each of the temperature conversion functions
Execute tests on all implemented functions to ensure they work correctly
